title: Google files trademark for ‘Pixel Watch’ ahead of device’s launch
content:
With the launch of the first Made by Google smartwatch seemingly around the corner, the device now has a more definite name thanks to a new trademark for “Pixel Watch.”

more…

The post Google files trademark for ‘Pixel Watch’ ahead of device’s launch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The first Made by Google smartwatch now has a more definite name thanks to a new trademark for "Pixel Watch."
